Question
========

Below is a cross tabulation of 80 workers' gender and the number of working hours per week (rounded to whole hours) are given.

  ------- ----------- ------------- ------------- ----------- < 18 hours 18 - 32 hours 33 - 36 hours > 36 hours male 1 7 14 8 woman 6 18 21 5 ------- ----------- ------------- ------------- -----------

The probability that a person randomly drawn from these workers is female is female and/or works less than 18 hours is

Answerlist
----------

* 7.5%
* 51%
* 63.75%
* 71.25%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 7.5%: Incorrect
* 51%: Incorrect
* 63.75%: Correct
* 71.25%: Incorrect
